section.6: The Book of the Times (of Prayer)

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Hurairah that the Messenger of Allah (ï·º) said:"Whoever catches up with a Rak'ah of the Subh prayer before the sun rises, then he has caught up with Subh, and whoever catches up with a Rak'ah of 'Asr prayer before the sun sets, then he has caught up with 'Asr
